Start the WEX Sales Learning Journey!
Your Sales Onboarding is starting on {!Training_Class__c.Date__c}. Download the class schedule here: Sales Onboarding Agenda.
Items to remember:
If you are attending on-site, arrive and be ready to start by 9:30 am at 95 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106. If you are attending WebEx, dial in and be ready to start by 9:30 am. You must finalize all your paperwork with HR before attending WEX Sales Onboarding. You will not be able to participate until this is completed. The dress policy is business casual. Jeans can be worn on Fridays.
Reach out to me with any questions. {!User.Name} | {!User.Phone} | {!User.MobilePhone} WEX Global Sales Training Team
